entry.title: WIND WARNING , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 02:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: E 20 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 120 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or freezing rain in the morning then to periods of rain later in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
